page.title: 17Going to church
page.content: The church (or more correctly chapel) of St Mary the Virgin lies at the western end of Raskelf.It is the only church in our area,though there is a Methodist chapel in another part of the village.It is a small low building surrounded by quite extensive grassland and a graveyard.Except for special occasions the church's attendance is fairly low,often falling into single figures.More popular in terms of both numbers attending and the enthusiasm brought out in local people have been the joint services combining the Methodist and Church of England congregations and ministers.A few people travel outside the area to go to various other churches.
